availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ambrose C. McGuire (Magoffin County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Jane Cook McGuire. Father of William McGuire, John McGuire, Edy McGuire, James McGuire, Joel McGuire, Jesse F. McGuire, Sarah McGuire, Samuel G. McGuire, and Leander C. McGuire. Farmer in Morgan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Magoffin County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 93B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, p. 493.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 17133.
